src:
Peparpenas IX/2019, 10 Atlet Difabel Babel Turun di 4 Cabor
07 Nov 2019, 14:05 by Lalang Gumilang



Peparpenas IX/2019, 10 Atlet Difabel Babel Turun di 4 Cabor



Peparpenas IX/2019, 10 Atlet Difabel Babel Turun di 4 Cabor


KBRN, Pangkalpinang; Sebanyak 10 atlet Pelajar Difabel Bangka Belitung saat ini mengikuti Pekan Paralympic Pelajar Nasional (Peparpenas ) IX di Jakarta mulai 6 - 13 November 20019. Mereka ikut serta di Cabor; Atletik, Bulutangkis, Catur, dan Renang. Kepala Dinas Kepemudaan dan Olahraga Provinsi Kepulauan Bangka Belitung, Suharto, berpesan kepada para pendamping dan pelatih atlet, agar selalu mendampingi atlet secara serius, sehingga dapat pergi dan pulang dengan selamat dan berprestasi. "Ini adalah atlet disabilitas, jadi perhatiannya harus lebih dan fokus," kata Suharto, Kamis (7/11/2019).Atlet pelajar Difabel Babel yaitu, Ardiana Suciati atlet Catur Tuna Daksa dari Pangkalpinang, Intan Anugrah Putri, Tuna Daksa dari Pangkalpinang, Luthfiah Jamila atlet Catur Tuna Netra dari Kabupaten Bangka, dan Syahfarul Ikhsan atlet Catur Tuna Daksa dari Pangkalpinang.Cabor Bulutangkis; Haikal Arya Nurichsan Tuna Rungu dari Kabupaten Bangka. Cabor atletik; Jeki Wahyudi atlet atletik Tuna Grahita dari Pangkalpinang, Nidin Cabor Aletik; Nidin Tuna Grahita dari Pangkalpinang, dan Niri Tuna Grahita dari Pangkalpinang. Untuk Cabor Renang, dua orang atlet yakni, Ken - Ken Sanjaya Tuna Rungu dari Kabupaten Bangka, dan Sudian Tuna Grahita dari Pangkalpinang.Lebih lanjut Suharto menjelaskan, Peparpenas 2019 dilaksanakan di empat tempat pertandingan, antara lain, Gelanggang Remaja Pulogadung, dan Matraman. Selain itu GOR Soemantri Brojonegoro, dan Jakarta timur.Kepala Sekolah Luar Biasa (SLB) Negeri Sungailiat, Sahara sangat mengapresiasi terhadap Diskepora Babel, pasalnya, keikutsertaan anak didiknya ini merupakan yang pertama kali mengikuti kejuaraan Peparpenas Tingkat Nasional. "Diskepora Babel telah melirik dan perhatian, sangat-sangat ada sekali perhatian dari diskepora. Ini suatu kebanggaan, penghargaan dan penghormatan kepada kita", ungkapnya dengan penuh semangat.
"Mohon doa dari seluruh masyarakat Babel, kami selaku pendidik dan juga selaku orang tua di sekolah sangat mengharapkan sekali anak didik kami ini bisa berprestasi ditingkat nasional," pungkasnya.
text:
Peparpenas IX / 2019, 10 Disabled Babylonians Disable Decreased in 4 Sports
Nov 7 2019, 14:05 by Lalang Gumilang



Peparpenas IX / 2019, 10 Disabled Babylonians Disable Decreased in 4 Sports



Peparpenas IX / 2019, 10 Disabled Babylonians Disable Decreased in 4 Sports


KBRN, Pangkalpinang; 10 Bangka Belitung Disabled Student athletes are currently participating in the IX National Student Paralympic Week (Peparpenas) in Jakarta from 6-13 November 20019. They are participating in Sports; Athletics, Badminton, Chess and Swimming. Head of the Youth and Sports Service of the Bangka Belitung Islands Province, Suharto, advised athletes' trainers and coaches to always accompany athletes seriously, so they could go and go home safely and excel. "This is a disability athlete, so his attention must be more and focused," Suharto said, Thursday (11/07/2019). The disabled athlete of the Babylonians, namely Ardiana Suciati, a Tuna Duna Chess athlete from Pangkalpinang, Intan Anugrah Putri, Tuna Daksa from Pangkalpinang, Luthfiah Jamila, Chess Tuna athlete from Bangka Regency, and Syahfarul Ikhsan, Chess Tuna athlete from Pangkalpinang.Cabor Badminton; Haikal Arya Nurichsan, Deaf from Bangka Regency. Athletic sports; Jeki Wahyudi athletic athlete Tuna Grahita from Pangkalpinang, Nidin Cabor Aletik; Nidin Tuna Grahita from Pangkalpinang, and Niri Tuna Grahita from Pangkalpinang. For Swimming Sports, two athletes namely, Ken - Ken Sanjaya Tuna of the Deaf from Bangka Regency, and Sudian Tuna Grahita from Pangkalpinang. Furthermore Suharto explained, Peparpenas 2019 was held in four competition venues, including, Pulogadung Youth Center, and Matraman. Besides GOR Soemantri Brojonegoro, and East Jakarta. Head of Sungailiat State Special School (SLB), Sahara really appreciated the Babylonian Diskepora, the article, the participation of students was the first time participating in the National Peparpenas Championship. "The Babylonian Diskepora has looked and paid attention, very, very much, the attention of the discepora. This is a matter of pride, appreciation and respect for us," he said with enthusiasm.
"Please pray from all the Babylonians, we as educators and also as parents at school really hope that our students can excel at the national level," he concluded.
